title: Press Release (Office of the President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan)
text: ( Source : Office of the President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan ) The Government of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, on behalf of the people of the country, welcomes President Obama 's decision on continuation of cooperation of
